Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46853 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.27-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-46853 affecting package memcached for versions less than 1.6.27-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package memcached is earlier than 1.6.27-1, affected by CVE-2023-46853
